177.name: Death magnitude (PITF)
177.description: Non-linear indicator for death magnitude due to genocide between 1955-2014
177.s_name: Political Instability Task Force (PITF) State Failure Problem Set, 1955-2014 (Death Magnitude)

source.name: Political Instability Task Force (PITF) State Failure Problem Set, 1955-2014 (Death Magnitude)
source.dataPublishedBy: Integrated Network for Societal Conflict Research
source.additionalInfo: Death magnitude is a non-linear measure, please see the codebook for further details. For countries that experienced multiple episodes of genocide during the period, the midpoint is taking and summed to calculate the total death magnitude variable. Countries with multiple episodes of genocide include: Angola, Burundi, China, Indonesia, Iraq, Rwanda, Sri Lanka, Sudan, Uganda and the Democratic Republic of Congo.
